Interface SystemCall

All Known Subinterfaces:
Kernel
public interface SystemCall

System call interface for OS kernel.

Version:
8/3/15
Author:
Stephan Jamieson

Field Summary
static int EXECVE
          Execute a program.
static int IO_REQUEST
          Perform IO request.
static int MAKE_DEVICE
          Create a device.
static int TERMINATE_PROCESS
          Terminate current process.
 
Method Summary
 int syscall(int number, Object... varargs)
          Invoke the system call with the given number, providing zero or more arguments.
 

Field Detail

EXECVE

static final int EXECVE
Execute a program. Program name is a required argument. Process ID is returned when the call completes.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

IO_REQUEST

static final int IO_REQUEST
Perform IO request. Device ID is a required argument.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MAKE_DEVICE

static final int MAKE_DEVICE
Create a device. Device ID and name are required arguments.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

TERMINATE_PROCESS

static final int TERMINATE_PROCESS
Terminate current process.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

syscall

int syscall(int number,
            Object... varargs)
Invoke the system call with the given number, providing zero or more arguments.
